trans-unit.resname: HHO·21 | Last-Minute Chopping | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: Ask target opponent if they remembered to get you a present. If they say yes, they put a card they own from outside the game into your hand. Otherwise, you gain control of target permanent they control.

trans-unit.resname: HHO·22 | Chaos Wrap | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chaos Wrap
trans-unit.target: Chaos Wrap

trans-unit.resname: HHO·22 | Chaos Wrap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library. Then they may look at the top card of their library and may wrap it. If it's a permanent card, they may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, they may put it onto the battlefield face down as a 4/4 red Present creature. (To wrap a card, put it inside lots of sleeves. If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a sleeve from it instead.)

trans-unit.source: Seasonal Sequels
trans-unit.target: Seasonal Sequels

trans-unit.resname: HHO·23 | Seasonal Sequels | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Pitch the titles of up to X holiday-themed sequels to target spell. Copy that spell for each title pitched, except the copy has that name. You may choose new targets for the copies. (Simply adding numbers isn't festive enough.)
trans-unit.target: Pitch the titles of up to X holiday-themed sequels to target spell. Copy that spell for each title pitched, except the copy has that name. You may choose new targets for the copies. (Simply adding numbers isn't festive enough.)
